description: [USIP] ECOWAS has proven it can solve crises. But like U.N. and other bodies, it needs updating.
title: Africa: For Peace in Africa, Boost Regional Blocs - - Like West Africa's Ecowas

description: [African Union] Adopted by the Peace and Security Council (PSC) of the African Union (AU) at its 1209th meeting, held on 18 April 2024, on Briefing on the Situation in Sudan.
